LanguageData.AllowCorpsesColonist.label: Επιτρέψτε πτώματα κατοίκων allow colonist corpses
LanguageData.AllowCorpsesColonist.description: Επιτρέψτε να υπάρχουν πτώματα αποίκων Allow dead former colonists.
LanguageData.AllowCorpsesStranger.label: Επιτρέψτε πτώματα ξένων allow stranger corpses
LanguageData.AllowCorpsesStranger.description: Επιτρέψτε να υπάρχουν πτώματα ξένων Allow dead former strangers and enemies.
LanguageData.AllowRotten.label: allow rotten
LanguageData.AllowRotten.description: Allow organic things which have started to rot.
LanguageData.AllowPlantFood.label: allow plant food
LanguageData.AllowPlantFood.description: Allow foods that are of quality equivalent to unharvested plants, like hay.
